tool_description: Antherica A.I. Writer Is a set of powerful APIs to provide a comprehensive suite of tools for content creation, translation, text revision, newsletter writing, keyword and hashtag searching, and QR code generation. Now with creation of AdWords advertisments and weather forecast. With the assistance of AI algorithms, users can streamline their content-related tasks and achieve professional-level results efficiently.
name: AI-writer
title: AI-writer

api_list.name: Revise
Weather forecast
api_list.description: Get the weather forecast indicating where and when.

required_parameters.name: place
required_parameters.default: now, this evening, tomorrow, next week

api_list.name: QR Code
api_list.description: Generate a QR Code from a link or a text.

api_list.name: Newsletter
api_list.description: Write a compelling newsletter from a given text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Antherica develops cusmomised applications and very successfull e-commerce. Try their newsletter platform AnthericaMail

api_list.name: Hashtags
api_list.description: Generate hashtags from a given text.

api_list.name: Keywords
api_list.description: Quickly define keywords from a given text

api_list.name: Translation
api_list.description: Translate content into any language just enter the language name.

api_list.name: Text
AdWords
api_list.description: Create AdWords advertiments from given text

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.default: Manage your campaigns in total autonomy with the AnthericaMail e-mail marketing platform. Communicate in a personalized way with your interlocutors. You can manage from a single interface: periodic newsletters, direct marketing, institutional communication, B2B, B2C, press releases, internal branding. Monitor the effectiveness of your communication in real time, profile and retain your target.
